Name: Spot The Difference - PHOTO for PC
About the game: Find 5 differences between the two pictures in a limited time. The answer changes every time you play! Sometimes a fairy will help you if you have a hard time. Fairies give life, time, hints, but they also bring bombs. Try to clear all the stages while restoring your vitality through a mini-game.
